page.title: 05NATURE TRAIL NEAR ARBROATH.
page.content: Many families among the local{ {population}use the nature trail for {recreation.}Elliot Nature Trail is a beautiful place to go to.The nature trail runs alongside a disused railway line which ran to Forfar.The things I like best about the nature trail are the trees,the plants,and the animals. When lucky you can see mice,rabbits, and squirrels.The trail runs alongside the river past Kellie Castle,a place of interest to{local historians.}It ends by Arbirlot village.It is sheltered when it is raining and warm when it is sunny.There are guide books about the trail and ten points on the route are marked so you can see from the guidebook the things of interest to look for at each point.
